name: Sovereignty
description:
A game based off of the popular series "Reigns". Submission to G4C NYC 2019 competition.

You are a newly elected mayor, and unfortunately for you, this town has problems. Lots of them. It's up to you to navigate through your term without being thrown out, and hopefully win the reelection when everything is dealt with.

Source: https://github.com/Crystal-Link/GameDevProject

Made by:

Vincent L.

Calvin Z.

Felix W.

Jack H.
